title: Medical Conference Announcement
transcript: The International Conference on Preventive Medicine will take place at the Grand Hotel Melbourne from November 14th to 16th. Distinguished speakers include Dr. Sarah Thompson from Harvard Medical School and Professor James Liu from Tokyo University Hospital. The three-day program covers topics such as nutrition science, exercise physiology, and mental health awareness. Early bird registration before September 30th costs 340 dollars for medical professionals and 180 dollars for students with valid ID. Standard registration increases to 420 and 230 dollars respectively after the deadline. All attendees receive conference proceedings, meal vouchers, and continuing education credits. Accommodation packages are available at the host hotel with special rates of 160 dollars per night for single occupancy. Abstract submissions for poster presentations close on October 5th.

questions.question: The conference will be held from November 14th to ______.
Where will the event take place?
Standard registration is cheaper than early bird.
Early bird registration for students costs ______ dollars.
Which is not a topic covered in the conference?
Accommodation is available for ______ dollars per night.
Poster abstracts must be submitted by:
Professor James Liu is from Tokyo University Hospital.
